item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Execution Units Are Often Pipelined (69 points | 24 comments)
2. AI companies cause most of traffic on forums (46 points | 24 comments)

6. Short Message Compression Using LLMs (39 points | 16 comments)

10. Insurers Rely on Doctors Whose Judgments Have Been Criticized by Courts (124 points | 94 comments)

12. 'Obelisks': New Class of Life Has Been Found in Human Digestive System (71 points | 17 comments)

14. Passkey technology is elegant, but it's most definitely not usable security (150 points | 173 comments)

21. The Cody Computer (210 points | 27 comments)

23. After 30 years, FDA overhauls guideline for the claim "Healthy" on food packages (25 points | 16 comments)
24. FTC Orders 'Gun Detection' Tech Maker Evolv to Stop Overstating Effectiveness (63 points | 59 comments)
25. PolyDye: Full color printer mod for Marlin 3D printers (101 points | 26 comments)
26. The Zombocom Problem (226 points | 65 comments)
27. 86Box: Emulator of x86-Based Machines (64 points | 25 comments)
28. Wishing Everyone a Happy Solsthelion (40 points | 26 comments)
29. Overloading the lambda abstraction in Haskell (2022) (54 points | 7 comments)
